sentence.Network_en: Unforgivingly, he insisted that she pay her debt to the last penny.
sentence.Network_cn: 令人不可原谅的是, 他坚持要她一分不少地还清全部债务.

means.word_mean: 1. without forgiveness; in an unforgiving manner;
